LeRig

I make techno music using code and synthesizers.

LeRig

PitchGlitch

BIO


LeRig is a computational Artist, who works with FoxDot as a real-time composition tool. He is experimenting with different styles and additional osc devices. However his preferred edm style is chunky, funky, punky, hardy in its beats with shadow-seeing lyrics and dark notes.
